content.content:
I've created a calendar event for your dinner with Cathy from 5:30 PM to 7:30 PM today. However, I was unable to connect to any online reservation services, including www.dinnerreservations.com and opentable.com.

I've included a note in the event description that you'll need to call the restaurant directly to make the reservation. The calendar event has been created and you'll receive a notification about it.

I apologize that I couldn't complete the full reservation online as requested. The issue appears to be with the reservation websites being inaccessible rather than with the process itself.
